org.deidentifier.arx.masking

Interface IInstanceMasker<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data to be masked.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInstanceMasker, AbstractInstBasedDictMasker, AbstractReplaceInstMasker, ConstantShiftDateMasker, ConstantShiftDecimalMasker, GenerateRandomDateMasker, GenerateRandomDecimalMasker, GenerateRandomIntegerDecimalMasker, GenerateRandomStringMasker, MatchAndReplaceStringMasker, RandomShiftDateMasker, RandomShiftDecimalMasker, ReplaceInstMasker, ReplaceInstMasker.ReplaceDateInstMasker, ReplaceInstMasker.ReplaceDecimalInstMasker, ReplaceInstMasker.ReplaceStringInstMasker, SplitAndReplaceStringMasker

    public interface IInstanceMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on single instances of data of type T.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T mask(T input)
      Masks the input data instance.

    • Method Detail

      • mask

        T mask(T input)
        Masks the input data instance.
        Parameters:
        input - The data instance to be masked.
        Returns:
        The masked data.
